author: ANDREW HODGE Staff Writer
title: Kid Fish to return Saturday to Lakeside Park | Local News | dailysentinel.com
text:
Anglers from ages 1 to 16 will compete in a pint-sized fishing tournament Saturday morning during the annual Kid Fish.
The tournament, hosted by Nacogdoches Parks and Recreation, is 9 a.m. to noon Saturday at Lakeside Park, 4800 Pearl St.
January 23, 2025
Anglers from ages 1 to 16 will compete in a pint-sized fishing tournament Saturday morning during the annual Kid Fish.
The tournament, hosted by Nacogdoches Parks and Recreation, is 9 a.m. to noon Saturday at Lakeside Park, 4800 Pearl St.
Participants can take home up to five rainbow trout, and more than 770 will be available to catch along with other fish found in the pond.
Trout require cold water and cannot survive in Texas year-round, which is why Kid Fish happens in January.
Prizes will be given for largest trout, smallest trout, heaviest string of five fish and largest overall fish. Last year, the largest overall fish was caught by 9-year-old Blain Stanford, who caught a trout weighing 0.9 pounds.
The event is free with no fishing license required, but participants should bring their own fishing gear if they have it, plus a supervising adult. As children catch fish, they will be registered for prizes at the weigh-in station at the pond.
Nacogdoches Fire and Rescue will also attend the event to grill sausages.
Andrew Hodge's email is andrew.hodge@dailysentinel.com.

author: hindi.sportskeeda.com
title: WWE: The Rock's daughter (Ava Raine) is a nepotism hire, according to wrestling journalist
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } The Rock and Ava Raine [Left to Right] The Rock has made waves in the promotion since acquiring his in-ring name and becoming a member of the board at TKO. A wrestling journalist recently spoke about Ava Raine, while criticizing her work with the company and calling her a nepotism hire.
Ava Raine is a fourth-generation WWE Superstar who followed in the footsteps of her father and joined the industry. Apart from a few matches, Raine hasn't yet been involved in a major storyline.
Speaking on Wrestling Observer Radio , Dave Meltzer spoke about Raine and said that she is a nepotism hire while discussing Cody Rhodes ' promo on Monday Night RAW. He also commented on her work with the promotion.
"You know what's funny? On RAW, you know, when Cody Rhodes was talking and [CM] Punk was going, you know, whatever he was, and Cody goes, all I ever did was folk style wrestling and I was a nepotism hire. And then I saw Ava [Raine] and was like, Nepotism hire, you know. At least Cody was a great athlete, you know what I mean. It's like Ava is just Dwayne [The Rock] Johnson's daughter., that's all... I mean she tried to be a wrestler and everything, but yeah." (From 1:13:05 to 1:13:45)
View this post on Instagram Instagram Post

author: Mickaël Meunier, Le Quotidien
title: Le chemin St-Anicet fermé temporairement en direction ouest
text:
Avec la neige et le vent, plusieurs camions qui circulaient sur le chemin St-Anicet, à la hauteur de la «côte à Jovy», ont fait des mises en portefeuille.
La route s’est donc retrouvée bloquée à cet endroit, en direction ouest. Le SPS a confirmé qu’il annoncerait lorsque s’effectuerait la reprise de la circulation dans le secteur.
D’ici là, les autorités rappellent aux automobilistes d’être prudents lors de leurs déplacements.

author: @bollywood_life
title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai 1st May 2025 Written Update Armaan Angry On Abhira And Slaps Krrish - YRKKH Spoiler: गुस्से में कृष को थप्पड़ मारेगा अरमान, अभिरा को भी सुनाएगा खरी-खोटी
text:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai Spoiler: टीवी शो 'ये रिश्ता क्या कहलाता है' में इन दिनों जबरदस्त हंगामा देखने को मिल रहा है. एक तरफ जहां अरमान पुकी को लेकर पजेसिव हो गया है तो वहीं दूसरी ओर चारू और अभीर लगातार घर से भागने की कोशिश कर रहे हैं. अब शो का अपकमिंग एपिसोड भी बेहद ही धमाकेदार होने वाला है. शो के आने वाले एपिसोड में देखने को मिलेगा कि अरमान गुस्से में कृष पर हाथ उठाएगा लेकिन अभिरा उसे रोक लेगी. इसके बाद अरमान का गुस्सा अभिरा पर फूट पड़ेगा.

author: Sentinel Digital Desk
title: Abducted Indian Army JCO rescued in Thoubal district of Manipur
text:
Imphal: A serving Junior Commissioned Officer (JCO) of the
Indian Army was rescued by the security forces, hours after he was kidnapped from his home by ‘unidentified elements’ in Manipur’s Thoubal district on Friday, officials said. A defence spokesman said that Naib Subedar Konsam Kheda Singh, a resident of Charangpat Mamang Leikai in Thoubal district, was abducted while on leave from his residence on Friday morning.
Army columns along with other security forces immediately launched a coordinated joint search operation, which led to the rescue of the JCO on Friday evening. The JCO is currently at the Waikhong police station in Thoubal district.
Though the exact cause of the abduction is not known yet, media reports suggested that it was an extortion attempt as his family had received such threats in the past.
Besides the coordinated search operation, checking of all vehicles plying on National Highway-102 (Imphal-Moreh) was conducted to locate the JCO.
Further investigation is underway. Since the outbreak of ethnic violence in Manipur in May last year, soldiers and security personnel, be they on leave or duty, or their relatives have been targeted for nefarious interests.
On February 27, the house of Amit Singh, Additional Superintendent of Police (Operations), Moirangthem, was attacked in Imphal. The attackers also abducted him and intimidated his family members by firing in the air, besides vandalising properties. The officer was later rescued due to the timely intervention by the security forces. (IANS)

Manipur: Indian Army Officer Kidnapped From Residence

author: Natural Medicine Journal
title: The Healing Potential of Prescribing Perspective | Natural Medicine Journal
text:
A patient’s mindset not only influences their experience and satisfaction level, but research indicates it can also impact their physical, mental, and emotional health. So how can members of the healthcare team influence the patient’s mindset in a meaningful way?
Mindset researcher Kari Leibowitz, PhD, has studied this topic extensively and is helping healthcare professionals embrace the healing potential of prescribing perspective. Dr. Leibowitz, a Stanford-trained PhD, was the lead author of a newly published paper on mindset training. She discusses that research, as well as practical ways healthcare professionals can prescribe mindset.
About the Expert
Kari Leibowitz is a health psychologist with a PhD in psychology from Stanford University, where she conducted research at the Stanford Mind & Body Lab. She is a U.S.-Norway Fulbright Scholar and a frequently invited writer and speaker on the power of mindset. Leibowitz has written about "wintertime mindset" for The New York Times and The Washington Post, and her work has been covered by The Guardian, CNN, National Geographic, Forbes, The Telegraph, BBC, and New Scientist. Her first book, How to Winter: Harness Your Mindset to Thrive on Cold, Dark, or Difficult Days, is available now. More information at karileibowitz.com.

author: Carolina Montenegro
title: Moneda de $500 con error de acuñación podría estar teniendo un valor más alto - LaKalle
text: Una [moneda de $500 colombiana](https://lakalle.bluradio.com/noticias/economia/moneda-de-100-esta-siendo-comprada-hasta-en-20-000-so35) La moneda, que fue acuñada en 2012, presenta un error en el núcleo, que está hecho de cobre. En lugar de tener un círculo perfecto, el núcleo tiene una forma ovalada. Este error es muy raro y solo se han reportado unos pocos casos. Por esta razón, los coleccionistas están dispuestos a pagar altos [precios por estas monedas.](https://lakalle.bluradio.com/noticias/tres-monedas-colombianas-por-las-que-pagan-mas-de-18-millones-so35) En el mercado de coleccionismo, las monedas con errores de acuñación suelen ser más valiosas que las monedas normales. Esto se debe a que son más raras y difíciles de encontrar. Publicidad En el caso de la moneda de $500, el error de acuñación es muy visible y fácil de detectar. Esto hace que la moneda sea aún más valiosa para los coleccionistas. Si usted tiene una moneda de $500 colombiana con un error de acuñación, podría valer una buena cantidad de dinero. Puede intentar venderla en el mercado de coleccionismo para obtener una ganancia. Sin embargo, es importante tener en cuenta que el precio de la moneda dependerá de varios factores, como la rareza del error, el estado de la moneda y la demanda de los coleccionistas. Publicidad Si usted está interesado en comprar una moneda de $500 con un error de acuñación, puede buscar en el mercado de coleccionismo online o en tiendas especializadas. [@numismaker] Error de acuñación en moneda de 500 pesos, [#numismatica] [#parati] [#viral] [#fyp] [#monedas] [♬ Caile - Luar La L] ¿Por qué hay personas que coleccionan monedas? Hay varias razones por las que las personas coleccionan monedas. Algunas de las razones más comunes incluyen: Publicidad - Interés histórico y cultural: Las monedas pueden tener una rica historia detrás de ellas. Los coleccionistas a menudo se sienten atraídos por las monedas antiguas debido a su conexión con eventos históricos, períodos de tiempo específicos o culturas particulares. - Valor monetario: Algunas monedas tienen un valor intrínseco debido a su rareza, antigüedad o errores de acuñación. Los coleccionistas pueden buscar estas monedas con la esperanza de que aumenten su valor con el tiempo. - Pasatiempo y disfrute personal: Para muchos, coleccionar monedas es un hobby apasionante. La búsqueda, el descubrimiento y el intercambio de monedas pueden ser una actividad placentera y educativa. - Conexión con la numismática: La numismática es el estudio y la colección de monedas y papel moneda. Algunos coleccionistas se sienten atraídos por la numismática como una forma de aprender sobre la historia económica, las técnicas de acuñación y los detalles de diseño de diferentes monedas.
